posts.content:
Its the H number that is the important one - that means its a late split 1500 SP Big Nut transmission

Is that what your'e expecting it to be?

yes, that's correct, thanks for letting me know.
im not sure whats best to do,
what are my options on engines attached to this box?
also brakes, should I keep the rear drum brakes or is it wise to change them to disks?
john

any type 1 engine will bolt straight on
keep the drums, changing to rear discs is a waste of time and money (unless you really have a plan that you think requires themâ€¦like circuit racing)

Thanks for the back brake advice, Front brakes? Discs with some kind of servo?

For the novice, like me, Type 1? I have not a clue,
But willing to listen
